description: What's changing with TfL fares in 2019

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Many fares are frozen until 2020, although on 2 January 2019 some fares changed. On average, Travelcards and caps increased by 3.1%."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"What fares changed?"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Some \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go\"\u003epay as you go\u003c/a\u003e and \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/single-and-return-tickets\"\u003ecash fares\u003c/a\u003e on London Overground","Some \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go\"\u003epay as you go \u003c/a\u003e and most \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/single-and-return-tickets\"\u003ecash fares \u003c/a\u003e on TfL Rail","Most \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go\"\u003epay as you go\u003c/a\u003e and \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/single-and-return-tickets\"\u003ecash fares \u003c/a\u003e on National Rail"," \u003ca href=\"/fares/find-fares/tube-and-rail-fares/caps-and-travelcard-prices\"\u003eDaily and weekly caps\u003c/a\u003e (except weekly capping on bus and tram only)"," \u003ca href=\"/fares/find-fares/tube-and-rail-fares/caps-and-travelcard-prices\"\u003eTravelcards\u003c/a\u003e "]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"London Overground and TfL Rail"}
Most pay as you go single fares are frozen.
Pay as you go fares for some journeys on London Overground routes to and from Liverpool Street, and on TfL Rail changed:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Some adult-rate fares increased by 20p or 30p","Some half adult-rate fares increased by 10p or 15p","Some child-rate fares increased by 10p or 15p"," \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/single-and-return-tickets\"\u003eSingle paper tickets\u003c/a\u003e increased on these routes and on London Overground south of Shadwell"]}
Find the cost of a single journey between any two stations with our single fare finder .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"National Rail single fares within Zones 1-9"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Most adult-rate \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go\"\u003epay as you go \u003c/a\u003e fares increased by 10p or 20p","Most half adult-rate \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go\"\u003epay as you go\u003c/a\u003e fares increased by 5p or 10p","Child rate off-peak pay as you go fares for \u003ca href=\"/fares/free-and-discounted-travel/11-15-zip-oyster-photocard\"\u003e11-15 Zip Oyster photocard\u003c/a\u003e holders are frozen. Fares for travel at peak times increased by 5p or 10p"," \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/single-and-return-tickets\"\u003eSingle paper tickets\u003c/a\u003e increased"]}
Pay as you go fares are frozen on National Rail routes where they are set by TfL:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["\u003cstrong\u003eChiltern Railways\u003c/strong\u003e : Amersham to Marylebone, West Ruislip to Marylebone","\u003cstrong\u003eThameslink and Great Northern\u003c/strong\u003e : Finsbury Park to King's Cross or Moorgate, West Hampstead to Elephant \u0026 Castle or London Bridge","\u003cstrong\u003eGreat Western Railway\u003c/strong\u003e : West Drayton or Greenford to Paddington"]}
Find the cost of a single journey between any two stations with our single fare finder .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Daily capping (all services)"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Adult-rate \u003ca href=\"/fares/find-fares/tube-and-rail-fares/caps-and-travelcard-prices\"\u003edaily caps\u003c/a\u003e increased by 20p-60p for journeys within Zones 1-9","Adult-rate \u003ca href=\"/fares/find-fares/tube-and-rail-fares/caps-and-travelcard-prices\"\u003edaily caps\u003c/a\u003e increased by 40p-£1.10 for journeys including \u003ca href=\"/fares/find-fares/national-rail-fares-beyond-zone-9\"\u003etravel beyond Zone 9\u003c/a\u003e (to Watford Junction, Hertford East, Shenfield and Gatwick Airport)","Child-rate off-peak \u003ca href=\"/fares/find-fares/tube-and-rail-fares/caps-and-travelcard-prices\"\u003edaily caps \u003c/a\u003e are frozen at £1.50","Child-rate Anytime \u003ca href=\"/fares/find-fares/tube-and-rail-fares/caps-and-travelcard-prices\"\u003edaily caps\u003c/a\u003e increased by 10p-25p within Zones 1-9","Child-rate \u003ca href=\"/fares/find-fares/tube-and-rail-fares/caps-and-travelcard-prices\"\u003edaily caps\u003c/a\u003e increased by 40p-50p for journeys including \u003ca href=\"/fares/find-fares/national-rail-fares-beyond-zone-9\"\u003etravel beyond Zone 9\u003c/a\u003e (to Watford Junction, Hertford East, Shenfield and Gatwick Airport)","Half adult-rate \u003ca href=\"/fares/find-fares/tube-and-rail-fares/caps-and-travelcard-prices\"\u003edaily caps\u003c/a\u003e increased by 10p-20p within Zones 1-9","Half adult-rate \u003ca href=\"/fares/find-fares/tube-and-rail-fares/caps-and-travelcard-prices\"\u003edaily caps\u003c/a\u003e increased by 25p-£1.10 for journeys including \u003ca href=\"/fares/find-fares/national-rail-fares-beyond-zone-9\"\u003etravel beyond Zone 9\u003c/a\u003e (to Watford Junction, Hertford East, Shenfield and Gatwick Airport)"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Weekly capping"}
Weekly capping (Monday to Sunday) for adults:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":[" \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go/contactless-and-mobile-pay-as-you-go\"\u003eContactless\u003c/a\u003e (card or device) - all services"," \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go/oyster-pay-as-you-go\"\u003eOyster card\u003c/a\u003e - bus and tram only"]}
Weekly caps (for up to seven days of travel ending on a Sunday) increased by an average of 3.1%.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Travelcards"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Adult-rate \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/travelcards-and-group-tickets\"\u003eDay Travelcard\u003c/a\u003e prices increased by 40p-70p. \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/travelcards-and-group-tickets\"\u003eGroup Day Travelcard \u003c/a\u003e prices will increase by 30p","Child-rate \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/travelcards-and-group-tickets\"\u003eDay Travelcard\u003c/a\u003e prices increased by 20p-40p. \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/travelcards-and-group-tickets\"\u003eChild Group Day Travelcard\u003c/a\u003e prices increased by 20p","Travelcard season ticket prices increased by an average of 3.1%"]}
See Tube and Rail fares .
See National Rail fares beyond Zone 9 .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"River Bus services for Thames Clippers"}
Fares changed for the Thames Clippers :

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Adult-rate \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go\"\u003epay as you go\u003c/a\u003e fares within and between River Zones Central and East, and between East and West increased by 20p-£1.50","Child-rate \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go\"\u003epay as you go\u003c/a\u003e fares within and between River Zones Central and East, and between East and West increased by 15p-75p","Half adult-rate \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go\"\u003epay as you go\u003c/a\u003e fares within and between River Zones Central and East, and between East and West increased by 30p-£1.50"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Frozen fares"}

cards.title: Collecting your order
texts: Orders made online or using the TfL Oyster app can be collected after 30 minutes as part of a journey and must be collected within 4 days.
